subject: Lockout/Tagout Procedure for Water Heater - Water Plant

key_points.description: Notify all affected employees that the lockout tagout will be performed.
Shut down equipment by normal stopping procedure and ensure equipment has come to a complete stop.
Lock out/tag out the following potentially hazardous energy sources per Park 500 Lockout Policy. See attachment for energy isolation locations.

details.procedure: Disconnects shall be in the 'OFF' position, locked and tagged with a Philip Morris-supplied locking device.
details.warning: Death or serious injury could result from disconnect arcing or exploding while equipment is under load/running.

details.procedure: Always stand to the side and look away from a disconnect box when activating on/off switch. This will minimize potential exposure should an electrical arc occur.
details.warning: Electrical shock or death could result from frayed, exposed or improperly grounded wiring or unauthorized tampering with energized electrical circuits.
